reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: "System Strengthening Partnership with Jordan's Ministry of Education"

description.narrative: L'iniziativa si riferisce ad contributo italiano all'iniziativa multidonatori denominata "System Strengthening Partnership with Jordan's Ministry of Education" a sostegno del Ministero dell'Istruzione giordano e realizzata da Unesco nell'ambito dell'Education Strategic Plan 2018-2022 (ESP) del Governo giordano, al fine di rafforzarne le capacità in termini di:

The proposed program aims to support the Ministry of Education (MoE) to strengthen data collection, utilization, monitoring, evaluation and reporting, research, and evidence-based planning and policy-making. UNESCO Amman with the support of technical specialists, will continue to strengthen the MoE's capacity to maintain, manage and utilize the OpenEMIS platform while also strengthening the core functions of planning and budgeting, monitoring and reporting, research and evaluation, data and information management, and development cooperation.
